EmailTemplate.name: National - Lead Referral Questionnaire
EmailTemplate.subject: DealChicken - Referral Questionnaire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
My name is Adam Bender with DealChicken.com. I am reaching out to you because you were listed as a reference for {!Opportunity.Account}.
We are in the process of determining if {!Opportunity.Account} is a fit as an advertiser with DealChicken.com and are looking to determine if {!Opportunity.Account} are in good standing with your company before we move forward.
At your earliest convenience, could you please provide the following information on {!Opportunity.Account}:
How long did you work with {!Opportunity.Account}?
Have you had any customer service issues with {!Opportunity.Account}?
Does {!Opportunity.Account} ship their products on time and how long does it take {!Opportunity.Account} to ship products?
How were orders fulfilled (drop ship, voucher codes) and where were the products coming from?
Would you recommend {!Opportunity.Account} to another business?
Any additional information that you could provide would also be greatly appreciated.
Thank you very much for your time.
The DealChicken team
